root: ^Wow! After finishing college and moving to this town, I can finally pursue my dreams of starting a business.
^I should buy a car to get around town though. Let me buy one from this car store right here.
^Now I have my car. It already seems to have some problems though. I need to get it repaired.
^When you see a floating “[i]” above a character or object, pressing the key will lead to an interaction.
